entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight then changing to ice pellets before morning. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
